Translations.Text: By the sky and the Taariq
— And what do you understand what the Taariq is
It is the shining star —
Not a soul but has a protector over it
Let man then see how he is created
He is created by means of fluid [blood] spurting
Out from between the spine and the ribs
It [blood] is certainly indeed capable of its return
The Day secrets are disclosed
For him [man] there will then be no power, and no helper
By the sky, ever returning [revolving]
And by the earth with its surface cracking open again and again with new growth of plants and vegetation
It [Qur'aan] is indeed a decisive Word
And it is not for just sport and amusement
They [suppressors of Truth] are indeed hatching a plot
And I [Allah] am devising a plot
So let those who suppress the Truth go their way; let them go for a little while
Glorify the name of your Lord, the Most High
Who created and gave the things created good shape
And Who determined [the span of existence for the things created] and guided them
And Who brought out the verdure [on the earth]
And then made it into dark rubble
We shall make you recite and then you will not forget
Except for what Allah wills. HE knows what is manifest and what is hidden
And We shall make things easy for you
Should the divine Words of the Qur'aan benefit them, do recite these to them
He who fears (Allah) shall take heed therefrom
And he who is wicked will shun it
He who will burn in the Great Fire
Then he will neither die in it, nor live
He will surely attain salvation who keeps himself pure [in worldly life]
And oft-remembers his Lordճ name and then prays to Him
